personalInfo.name: John Doe
personalInfo.summary: Experienced Java Developer with over 5 years of experience in developing enterprise applications using Java/J2EE, Spring MVC, and RESTful web services.

experience.description: Developed and maintained enterprise applications using Java, Spring Boot, and RESTful web services. Implemented microservices architecture and containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for mobile applications. Worked with Spring MVC framework and integrated with third-party services. Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers.
Assisted in developing and testing Java applications. Worked with SOAP web services and implemented database operations using Hibernate ORM.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

certifications.name: Oracle Certified Professional, Java SE 11 Developer
